Room.Name: Ivanhouse Sporting Arena - Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the Main Entrance to the Ivanhouse Sporting Arena.
Room.LongDescription: At this point, you have a number of choices. To the north, you may enter the Beginner's Circle. Up to three gladiators may engage a single opponent. This area is exclusively for lower-level characters who have not quite mastered the art of gladiator fighting. To the northeast is the Gladiator Pit, a small arena where you may challenge a human gladiator in one-on-one combat. To the northwest is the Mul Pit, another small arena where you may challenge a mul gladiator, a human/dwarven half-breed, in hand-to-hand combat. Again, this arena only permits one competitor at a time.
